contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = You're All Worthless And Weak | Type = live | Artist = [[Gwar]] | Cover = You'reAllWorthlessandWeak.jpg | Released = November 8, 2000 | Recorded = October 31, 2000 | Genre = [[Thrash metal]] | Length = 56:42 | Label = Slave Pit Records | Producer = ??? | Last album = ''[[Slaves Going Single]]''<br /> (2000) | This album = ''You're All Worthless And Weak''<br />(2000) | Next album = ''[[Violence Has Arrived]] ''<br />(2001) }} '''''You're All Worthless And Weak''''' is the first live album by heavy metal band [[Gwar]]. It was recorded at the 9:30 Club in [[Washington, DC]], on [[Halloween]]. It features the return of Sexecutioner and Sleazy P. Martini, as well as Techno Destructo and his brother Bozo Destructo. The show was also one of the last appearances of [[Slymenstra Hymen]], though she isn't heard. At first, it was exclusively available to members of the Total Slavery Fan Club but it was later made available to the general public through the band's official website. The album has since gone out of print. [[The Gwarnage Campaign]] is made up of videos taken from this show, with only a few tracks taken from other concerts of the tour. The title taken from a line in the film ''[[Animal House]]''. ==Track listing== {{Tracklist | title1 = The Salaminizer | length1 = 9:58 | title2 = Babyraper | length2 = 2:43 | title3 = Jagermonsta | length3 = 2:46 | title4 = Sleazy Sells the Earth | length4 = 1:52 | title5 = Think You Outta Know This | length5 = 3:12 | title6 = Death Pod | length6 = 4:19 | title7 = I'm in Love (With a Dead Dog) | length7 = 4:14 | title8 = Nitro-Burnin' Funny Bong | length8 = 4:13 | title9 = Penguin Attack | length9 = 3:33 | title10 = War Toy | length10 = 2:39 | title11 = Love Surgery | length11 = 5:25 | title12 = Untitled track | length12 = 2:31 | title13 = The Private Pain of Techno Destructo | length13 = 3:30 | title14 = Crush, Kill, Destroy | length14 = 2:07 | title15 = Slaughterama | length15 = 8:40 }} {{GWAR}} {{DEFAULTSORT:You're All Worthless And Weak}} [[Category:Gwar albums]] [[Category:2000 live albums]]
